title: I douged from crashed champ select and have to wait the penalty
body: > I recorded the champ select and after it and I dont want to get penalty again for longer time. how can I prevent it? {{item:3026}}

replies.body: You can't. Just keep buying skins and getting screwed by riot. Might check your drivers though, that was the problem for me last time this happened.
I checked my files and I reinstall the game. Still nothing

The [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) system treats any dodge equally regardless of intent, so it's really important to resolve whatever is causing this issue.  Are you getting any error messages?  Give me some more detail on what exactly is going on.  Happy to help!
Yes, Everyday I have 10 bugsplats or more. The thing is this isnt the game, this is the client. I opened the bugfixer a lot of times, but it says I have no errors

Hey there, what do you mean by the bugfixer?  You might have a driver issue or problem with your game files causing the client to crash out.  In this case, run through the steps in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to make sure your pc and game files are in good health.
